"About [PSO2es]":
"For a limited time, Akhtar and Khorshid, the heroines of [PSO2es] Season 3, will be appearing alongside Gene in [PSO2]!

[PSO2es] is a game that you can play on your smartphone. It's a full action game, but you control all the action by simply tapping and swiping.

Do battle against mighty foes alongside \"Weaponoids\", life forms born from the weapons that you know from [PSO2]! Through Story Quests, experience its grand, universe-spanning story, featuring characters like Gene, More, the Darker Busters, their new friend Akhtar and the ever-increasing number of Weaponoids!"

"[PSO2es] can link to your [PSO2] data. By linking your data, you can play [PSO2es] with the characters you already have in [PSO2]. You will also have free access to \"PSO2es Storage\", as well as the opportunity to earn EXP tickets and various rare items. By playing [PSO2es], you can enjoy [PSO2] anytime, anywhere, while also making your progression more efficient.

If you're interested, download it now! Play [PSO2es] and get to know Gene and the Darker Busters! Akhtar, Khorshid and many, many Weaponoids are waiting for you in a whole new world! Now, off to a new adventure!!"
